Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
bto.Boundaries.UserInterface
public class UserInterface extends Object
Main user interface for the BTO (Build-To-Order) Management System. Handles user authentication, registration, and navigation between different user interfaces based on user roles.

    Constructor initializes all controllers and user interfaces.

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface(AuthController authController, ProjectController projectController, ApplicationController applicationController, EnquiryController enquiryController, RegistrationController registrationController, WithdrawalController withdrawalController, BookingController bookingController, ReceiptGenerator receiptGenerator, ReportController reportController)
      Constructor initializes all controllers and user interfaces.
      Parameters:
      authController - Controller for authentication processes
      projectController - Controller for project-related operations
      applicationController - Controller for managing applications
      enquiryController - Controller for handling enquiries
      registrationController - Controller for user registration
      withdrawalController - Controller for withdrawal requests
      bookingController - Controller for booking operations
      receiptGenerator - Generator for creating receipts
      reportController - Controller for generating reports

  • Method Details

    • displayLoginMenu

      public void displayLoginMenu()
      Displays the login menu with options to login, sign up, or exit. Handles user authentication and role-based registration.

    • displayUserMenu

      public void displayUserMenu(User user)
      Displays the appropriate user menu based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      user - The logged-in user whose menu will be displayed
